entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Entry.IsPassword several bugs on Windows (value from binding is not set, IsPassword cannot be changed without reseting value if from value came from binding instead of user input #6870
  • [iOS] Cannot Debug #6869
  • [Windows] BoolToVisibilityConverter returns the incorrect type #6868
  • Can't start Blazor MAUI project rc2 #6867
  • Maui NET ios app error when trying to create ipa file #6866
  • SQL Server pre-login handshake failed Android 5,6,8.1 #6859
    6.0.300-servicing
  • VisualStateGroupList set from a Style aren't unapplied when the Style is unapplied #6857
    6.0.300
  • Properties set from a Setter in a VSGL in a Style have the wrong priority #6856
    6.0.300
  • MenuBarItems are disappearing when navigating back from an another page #6855
  • IndicatorView for CarouselView does not work #6854
    6.0.300
  • MauiIcon ForegroundScale does not work (does not scale icon under Android) #6850
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [Bug] Inconsistent result on Binding change by DataTrigger #6849
    6.0.300-servicing
  • MacOS - CollectionView with grouping + GridItemsLayout does not load. #6848
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [Bug] DataTrigger not applied when null at initial #6847
  • Picker Title displays above the control on Windows #6845
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Get native Window handle from control #6843
  • Reopen issue #4593. VS 17.2 prv6. Error NETSDK1130 Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.winmd cannot be referenced. Referencing a Windows Metadata component directly when targeting .NET 5 or higher is not supported. For more information, see https://aka.ms/netsdk1130 #6842
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Disabled CheckBox on iOS always Tints Grey #6839

Closed

  • CarouselView crashes with Loop="True" #6521
    6.0.300
  • App crashes when changing CarouselView Loop property at runtime #6457
    6.0.300
  • CarouselView Position property not updating after changing ItemsSource #6328
    6.0.300
  • C# Hot Reload Broken in VS 2022 17.2.0 Preview 3 #4989
    6.0.300
  • Android.Webkit namespace is not found and project does not compile when classes are in Platform/Android directory #6610
    6.0.300
  • Maui RC1 - "System.NotSupportedException: Must call AddTerm AddSeparator in that order" #6489
    6.0.300
  • Adding an image file to Resources/Images folder gets incorrectly set as AndroidResource Build Action #6418
    6.0.300
  • Blazor MAUI - Clipboard Android - NotAllowedError: Write permission denied #6846
  • Loading native iOS library #6830
  • [Android] SwipeItem Unexpectedly Turns IconImageSource Into Only A Cutout When Setting BackgroundColor #6825
    6.0.300-servicing
  • If Listview IsEnabled is false, items are still enabled #6581
    6.0.300
  • iOS Checkbox is causing an infinite loop #6687
    6.0.300
  • CollectionView Crash on Android... RequestBuilder Error #6518
    6.0.300
  • Remove preview branding form the templates for GA #6617
    6.0.300
  • Border Rendered Incorrectly While giving Corner Radius in some cases #6805
    6.0.300
  • The SearchHandler is not rendered on Windows #6036
    6.0.300
  • Please have a look at #4397 for instructions on how to build/archive and let us know there if things still aren't working. Thanks! #6865
  • Shell.FlyoutBehavior="Locked" shows empy menu on Andriod #6701
    6.0.300
  • Publish MAUI Project with project reference To Class library produces errors. #6717
    6.0.300
  • Multi-targeting frameworks in Maui does not work #5833
    6.0.300-servicing
  • How to change CornerRadius dynamically? #6646
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Cannot publish freshly created MAUI app as documented #6831
  • With UseMaui = true in class library I get a '"CopyLocalFilesOutputGroup" does not exist' error #6529
    6.0.300
  • Rendering after IsVisible flip is messed up #6069
    6.0.300
  • Some control styling doesn't reflect UserAppTheme #6006
    6.0.300

PullRequests

Created

  • Set GenerateDocumentationFile=true for Core and Controls.Core #6874
    area/docs 📓
  • [workload] Remove Microsoft.Maui.Dependencies pack #6871
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 7
  • Bump _HarfBuzzSharpVersion from 2.8.2-preview.256 to 2.8.2-preview.261 #6862
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump xunit.runner.visualstudio from 2.4.3 to 2.4.4 #6861
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump _SkiaSharpVersion from 2.88.0-preview.256 to 2.88.0-preview.261 #6860
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Core] Fix crash in DeviceStateTrigger #6853
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, fatal, 6.0.300
  • [Entry/Win] Fixed cursor jumping to the beginning of a PasswordBox #6841
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300

Merged

  • [Android] Update the adapter used by RecyclerViewScrollListener #6601
    area/collectionview 📃, partner/android, 6.0.300
  • [android] update AOT profiles #6834
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Show SearchHandler on Windows #6818
    area/shell 🐢, area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Correctly enable/disable ListView #6852
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/ListView, 6.0.300
  • Cache checkbox locally #6840
    control-checkbox, 6.0.300
  • [src/Templates] Remove preview language #6622
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, 6.0.300
  • Fix Border.Stroke clipped issue #6851
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • Add a locked flyout immediately to the view #6827
    platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢, 6.0.300
  • Properties moved to UseMauiCore need to work in the repo #6844
  • Move some of the require props into Core and fix #6529 #6767
    area/single project ☝️, platform/windows 🪟, p/1, 6.0.300
  • Visibility should affect the container if there is one #6828
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300
  • Fix the device tests #6832
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, 6.0.300
  • Add default BackgroundColor to controls in Styles #6820
    area/templates 📄, area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300

Updated

  • Reenable CA1416 in Essentials #6835
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.300
  • Remove Frame arrange/measure overrides #6794
    area/layout 🔲, control-frame, 6.0.300
  • [iOS] Update Editor scroll position #4850
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300
  • Force parent invalidation on Margin and LayoutOptions changes #6836
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, 6.0.300
  • [Android] Implement logic to move focus to next Entry #5740
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-servicing
  • Add Geolocation iOS14+ Reduced Accuracy Support #5826
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.300
  • [Windows] Implement Windows Platform Specifics #5855
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, 6.0.300
  • [Android] Implement Android Platform Specifics #5831
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300
  • [iOS] Implement iOS Platform Specifics #5879
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300
  • [workload] Remove Microsoft.Maui.Extensions pack #5918
    do-not-merge, area/setup 🪄, .NET 7
  • [foldable] Package reference instead of project reference #6514
    area/controls 🎮, area/infrastructure 🏗️, control-dualscreen, 6.0.300-servicing
  • Add the three-parameter overload #6790
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0.300
  • [X] Optimize OnPlatform element syntax #5611
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, 6.0.300
  • Fix Share does not block when awaited on iOS #6812
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.300
  • [Windows] Correctly size the ImageButton BitmapImage #6663
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button, 6.0.300
  • [iOS] Add dismiss keyboard button to EditorHandler #4345
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300
  • Implement InputView IsSpellCheckEnabled property #3729
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300
